tracktor_api¶

class tik_tracktor.tracktor_api.TracktorAPI(base_url, username=None, password=None)¶

Bases: object

Tracktor API wrapper for Tracktor integration into TIK Manager. Sends requests for Tracktor backend directly.

base_url¶

The base URL of the Tracktor backend.

Type:

str

username¶

Username for authentication.

Type:

str

password¶

Password for authentication.

Type:

str

api_request(method, endpoint, **kwargs)¶

Sends an HTTP request to the Tracktor backend.

Parameters:

  • method (str) – HTTP method (e.g., ‘GET’, ‘POST’, ‘PUT’).

  • endpoint (str) – API endpoint (e.g., ‘/projects’).

  • **kwargs – Additional arguments.

Returns:

The JSON response from the backend, or None if no content.

Return type:

dict or None

Raises:

requests.HTTPError – If the HTTP request fails.

get_assets(project_id)¶

Retrieves all assets for a given project.

Parameters:

project_id (int) – The project id.

Returns:

A list of asset data dictionaries.

Return type:

list

get_project(project_id)¶

Retrieves a project by its ID.

Parameters:

project_id (int) – The project id.

Returns:

Project data.

Return type:

dict

get_projects()¶

Retrieves all projects.

Returns:

A list of project data dictionaries.

Return type:

list

get_shots(project_id)¶

Retrieves all shots for a given project.

Parameters:

project_id (int) – The project id.

Returns:

A list of shot data dictionaries.

Return type:

list

login()¶

Checks that the usename and password are present before passing them to authentication

Returns:

True if credentials are present.

Return type:

bool

Raises:

ValueError – If username or password is missing.

logout()¶

Logs out the current user by clearing credentials.

Returns:

True if logout was successful.

Return type:

bool
